system.effect: If target takes any wounds, make Toughness Test with -10*X. Failiure means target takes extra 1d10 Damage not reduced by Armour or Toughness.

description.value: If target takes any wounds, make Toughness Test with -10*X. Failiure means target takes extra 1d10 Damage not reduced by Armour or Toughness.
